title: The 4 Dollar Android Smartphone
description: So it sounds like Adcom (company featured in this video) may sue the company manufacturing the 4 dollar version.  If you visit the website for the Freedom 251 you'll see an exact replica listed at a far lower price. I'm not sure they'll ever be able to deliver at that price, others are skeptical as well. Starting to sound like a bunch of these went out the side door at the Adcom factory.  More info on the $4 Android phone...        FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
